meanings.definition: A puppet manipulated from above by strings attached to its jointed limbs.
meanings.sent1: The marionettes danced gracefully on the stage, controlled by invisible strings.
meanings.sent2: Children were delighted by the marionettes' performance at the puppet show.
meanings.sent3: The marionettes decided to rebel against their puppeteer and take control of the show!
meanings.sent4: In the hands of fate, we are all mere marionettes, dancing to an unseen tune.
meanings.sent5: The marionettes' intricate movements mesmerized the audience.

meanings.definition: A person who is easily manipulated or controlled by others.
meanings.sent1: She was like a marionette, always doing whatever others told her to do.
meanings.sent2: He realized he had been a marionette in the hands of his manipulative boss.
meanings.sent3: The marionette of the office, he never made a decision without approval.
meanings.sent4: Caught in their web of lies, she felt like a marionette with no control over her actions.
meanings.sent5: The cult leader treated his followers like marionettes, pulling their strings at will.
